entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:22 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or freezing drizzle ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain this morning and early this afternoon. Freezing rain or rain beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to snow or ice pellets near midnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
